DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine the effect of external beam radiation therapy in the prevention of restenosis following successful balloon aortic valvuloplasty in severe, symptomatic aortic stenosis.
DOC.brief_title: Adjuvant Radiation in Aortic Valvuloplasty - ARAVA
DOC.criteria: Severe Aortic Stenosis NYHA Class 24 CHF Symptoms Age > 75 EuroSCORE > 7 Prohibitively High Risk for Aortic Valve Replacement Surgery as Designated by a Cardiac Surgeon
